short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Size guarantee selects a best fit dress on your favourite e-commerce store powered by AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Size guarantee is human intelligence based web product that serves users to select best fitted dress on e-commerce web sites for a user. We aim at eliminating the mind block based on size, in buying a loved clothing product online or when you are buying a clothing product online for your loved one.
